email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer the vessel MV OCEAN WAVE for your 12,500MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai under CFR terms. The initial freight quote is USD 42 per metric ton.

The vessel has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 225m. The laycan is 25-30 September. Please let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you revise the rate to USD 38 per metric ton?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the current market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. We are willing to proceed at USD 40 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains 25-30 September. Could you confirm the demurrage rate and laytime details?

Best regards,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. The laytime will start on 2023-09-25 and end on 2023-09-30. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
